text: Garapan (Old Japanese name: 柄帆町, Garapan-chō) is the largest village on the island of Saipan, Northern Mariana Islands. It is also the center of the tourism industry on the island. Garapan has an area of and a population of 3,096 (census of population, 2020).2020 Census Population of the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands: Municipality and Village, U.S. Census Bureau. ==References== Category:Northern Mariana Islands
title: Garapan
